original_title: The Wave by The FIRM: Ride the WAVE
overview: Ride the WAVE packs in everything you need to know to gain maximum results with The FIRM WAVE. In this easy to follow, step-by-step instruction, you'll learn proper exercise techniques while getting a great workout. Just 3 simple stances and 3 simple moves are all you need to Ride the WAVE to success!
title: The Wave by The FIRM: Ride the WAVE
